entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0163.10085] A value of 127,000,000 has been reported for the concept us-gaap:PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipment. This represents additions to PPE and is used in the segment note as a descendant of a segment reporting table us-gaap:ScheduleOfSegmentReportingInformationBySegmentTable. When reporting additions to long lived assets in the segment disclosure the element SegmentExpenditureAdditionToLongLivedAssets should be used even if the value is the same as the additions to PPE.
Concept : us-gaap:PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipment Value : 127,000,000 Total period : 2024-01-01 to 2024-03-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis=noc:SpaceSystemsMember Decimals : -6
Rule Element Id:10085 Rule version: 26.0.9 - noc-20250331.htm 8

property.name: label
property.value: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment

property.name: unitRef
property.value: usd ($)
